§ Titano (Fuerza-T)

⸺ by Charles Iliya Krempeaux

**Titano** is a [[fuerza-t]] character.

**Fuerza-T** are action-figure toys created by **Top Toys** in [[argentina]] using the original [[masters-of-the-universe]] molds for plastic-injection-molding.

§§ Story

**Titano**'s card-back provided the following story, written in the Spanish language:

― TITANO
― 
― FUERZA T
― 
― EDAD:
― 50 años
― 
― LUGAR DE NACIMIENTO: 
― Atenas, Grecia
― 
― OBSERVACIONES:
― un excelente lanzador de disco y peligroso cuando utiliza su maza.
― Con la tecnologia de su pechera computarizada teledirije sus armas a distancia mediante conección láser.

§§ Action Figure

Like most [[motu]] and [[fuerza-t]] action-figures, the **Titano** action-figure shared parts with other action-figures —

• **Titano**'s **head** is the same head as [[motu-fisto]].
• **Titano**'s **armor** is the same armor as [[motu-man-at-arms]].
